## Demographic Targeting

How advertisers target different age groups and genders.

```{r setup}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| error: false
#| results: 'hide'

# Load required libraries
library(dashboardr)
library(dplyr)
library(highcharter)

# Global chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  error = FALSE,
  fig.width = 12,
  fig.height = 8,
  dpi = 300
)

# Load multiple datasets

# Load age_data
age_data <- readRDS('age_data_6obs.rds')
cat('age_data loaded:', nrow(age_data), 'rows,', ncol(age_data), 'columns\n')

# Load gender_data
gender_data <- readRDS('gender_data_2obs.rds')
cat('gender_data loaded:', nrow(gender_data), 'rows,', ncol(gender_data), 'columns\n')

```

## Demographics


::: {.panel-tabset}

### Age


```{r demographics-age}
# Age Targeting
result <- create_bar(
  data = age_data,
  title = "Age Targeting",
  horizontal = TRUE,
  x_var = "age_group",
  weight_var = "spend"
)

result
```


### Gender


```{r demographics-gender}
# Gender Targeting
result <- create_bar(
  data = gender_data,
  title = "Gender Targeting",
  horizontal = TRUE,
  x_var = "gender",
  weight_var = "spend"
)

result
```


:::
